attributes.action: Abolish Income Tax on Pensions and Savings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We all work for a living and rightly pay Income Tax on our wages. However, after our wages are taxed we then put money into our pensions and savings plans which are then Income Taxed again for a second time when we come to pensionable age or inthe case of our savings, from the day we invest the money into a Savings account.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish Income Tax on Pensions and Savings."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11282.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/incomeTaxed/
